typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Calls as (SequenceNumber as string, JourneyPatternPointRef as string, IsTimingPoint as boolean, DepartureTimetabledEarliestDateTime as string, ArrivalTimetabledLatestDateTime as string)[],
		JourneyNumber as string,
		OriginName as string,
		PrimaryDestinationName as string,
		SecondaryDestinationName as string,
		SecondaryDestinationType as string,
		TransportMode as string,
		ContractorOrganizationId as string,
		TimetabledStartDateTime as string,
		TimetabledEndDateTime as string,
		LineRef as string,
		DirectionOfLineRef as string,
		JourneyPatternRef as string,
		AdvanceOrderCondition as string,
		JourneyCreationParameters as string,
		JourneyRef as (ObjectRef as string, OperatingDayDate as string),
		TimeStamps as (TimeStamp as string, Name as string)[],
		partitionKey as string,
		LastModifiedDateTime as string,
		ttl as string,
		id as string,
		Type as string,
		{_rid} as string,
		{_self} as string,
		{_etag} as string,
		{_attachments} as string,
		{_ts} as string,
		type as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'singleDocument',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sourceJson
sourceJson select(mapColumn(
		Calls,
		JourneyNumber,
		OriginName,
		PrimaryDestinationName,
		SecondaryDestinationName,
		SecondaryDestinationType,
		TransportMode,
		ContractorOrganizationId,
		TimetabledStartDateTime,
		TimetabledEndDateTime,
		LineRef,
		DirectionOfLineRef,
		JourneyPatternRef,
		AdvanceOrderCondition,
		JourneyCreationParameters,
		JourneyRef,
		TimeStamps,
		partitionKey,
		LastModifiedDateTime,
		ttl,
		id,
		Type = sourceJson@Type,
		{_rid},
		{_self},
		{_etag},
		{_attachments},
		{_ts}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
